attributes.action: Stop trying to spend the country out of recession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The country's debt is reported to be soaring above £860bn and with a further £30bn or more planned for next year, is this really the only way they government works? Spending money which they havn't got? (which, by the way is what got the world into this situation)
Common sense says if you havn't got any money, you can't spend any more money. Try and think up some other methods to boost the economy, without risking it in the process.
